t: adidas Unveils the PureBoost Go with A$AP Ferg and Pledges to Refurbish Track in Harlem - WearTesters
s: July 17, 2018 - Designed for the “urban runner,” the adidas PureBoost Go has been officially unveiled by the three stripes brand. It is being supported by rapper A$AP Ferg and adidas Runners NYC captain Kwasi Kessie.

t: Amazon (company) - Wikipedia
s: 1 day ago - The company launched in 2005 in Dubai, United Arab Emirates and served multiple areas across the Middle East. On March 28, 2017, Amazon acquired Souq.com for $580 million. The company was re-branded as Amazon and its infrastructure was used to expand Amazon's online platform in the Middle East.

t: A$AP Ferg - EWG Management
s: Ferg first found his love of fashion from his father, Darold, who owned a Harlem boutique which printed shirts and logos for record labels. After creating and selling custom t-shirts in high school, Ferg started creating his own jewelry line and a leather goods brand, Devoni.
